name: Skateboard - Elongated Wheel
description:
---A new simple and fun skateboarding game released in 2021---

Are you bored? Your medicine in this game!

Get on your skateboard now!

Swipe left and right to avoid obstacles and don't hit any obstacles along the way!

Are you good enough to cross the road in one go?

Incredibly fun and different control - enlarge or shrink the wheels of the skateboard correctly. You have to be precise to get through tighter spaces, and the faster the skateboard, the more fun and focused you'll be.

- Short and fun levels!

- More than 20 skateboards and characters!

- 30 different levels!

- 1 special dance animation!

What are you waiting for? Download now and start having fun!

NEW AND VERY FUN LEVELS COMING SOON!
